title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the Mavericks future and their chances of making it back to the Conference Finals. Nick Wright joins the show to explain why he was on the Dallas bandwagon. Plus, Dale Earnhardt Jr. previews the Indy 500 this weekend. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
